thread.title: Asia-Pacific Stocks Buoyed by Xi Speech

author: Gregor Stuart Hunter
title: Asia-Pacific Stocks Buoyed by Xi Speech
text:
Xi comments allay trade anxieties Stocks shrug off raid on Trump lawyer Zuckerberg due on Capitol Hill; tech stocks rally U.S. stocks climbed Tuesday, with the Dow gaining more than 400 points, as remarks from Chinese President Xi Jinping soothed concerns about a trade war that have roiled markets in recent weeks.
The rally was broad-based, with 10 of 11 sectors in the S&P 500 charging higher. Energy stocks in the index led the way, rising 3.2%, as the price of crude oil rose 3% to $65.31 a barrel.
... RELATED VIDEO Three Ways China Gets Its Hands on U.S. Tech President Trump says China is forcing U.S. companies to transfer their technology secrets to China. WSJ's Shelby Holliday tells you how. Illustration: Adele Morgan To
